content:
1. I am a 24-year-old woman.
2. I have a general understanding of what sexual lubricants are used for and their benefits but I don't know much about specific brands or types. However, I have heard that using a lubricant during sexual intercourse can improve the overall experience by reducing friction and discomfort, and also can enhance pleasure.
3. Yes, I have used lubricant before. I have used Durex brand, I chose it because it was easily available at the store and I trust the brand. I also liked that it was water-based, which is important for me because it makes it easy to clean and it is safe to use with condoms and toys.
4. I consider the ingredients and price when purchasing a lubricant. I also prefer water based lubricants over silicone based lubricants because they are easier to clean and less likely to cause irritation. Additionally, I also check for the pH level and if it's organic or not.
5. Yes, I've seen advertisements for lubricants before. I don't remember specific brands but I found them to be informative and not too pushy. I liked that they highlighted the benefits of using lubricants and how it can enhance the sexual experience.
6. Yes, I think lubricants are important for sexual experiences. They can make the experience more comfortable and enjoyable by reducing friction and discomfort. They can also enhance pleasure and intimacy between partners.
7. I am generally comfortable discussing and buying lubricants. I would rather buy it online than in person, as I find it less awkward and also it gives me a wider range of options to choose from.
8. The advertisement didn't really influence my opinion about the lubricant but it did make me aware of the different types of lubricants available and the benefits of using them. It also gave me an idea of the various brands and their features, which helped me make an informed decision.
9. I would
